title: Broken Ranked System
body: I finished my placements mid season and I had a silver 2 MMR I went 7 and 3 I get placed Bronze 1 and my MMR drops to Silver 4 why is the ranked system so stupid I dont get this stupid shit they need to fix this asap I deserve silver and there are other people who have had this happen to them and they dont do anything about it

replies.body:
Like has been stated below, please don't use websites that give you your "MMR" and base things upon this. No website will have your MMR, only select few Rioters know the correct algorithm, meaning websites like op.gg can give an estimate, although are likley way off. 

At the beginning of a season, every player that played rank the previous season endures a "soft reset" where their MMR drops a few tiers and they do their placements from there. Almost every single player during this period will end up in a rank that was lower than where they ended in the previous season, even if you go even or positive. 

I went 8-2 and went from P4 to G1. I have friends that won the same amount as me and dropped even further. For you, dropping from S5 to B1 may seem like a kick in the teeth, but in reality it isn't actually that bad. It is said that the "true" rank of a player isn't actually discovered until they play 100 games, since 10 is a pretty small amount to judge skill off when the player will likely be playing a lot more. 

Keep climbing, there is no reason you can't be silver (and maybe even higher) again ♥
same thing but end up in lowest b5 because i won 6 games and did well in all of them
You ended B4 last season, after the "soft reset", 6-4 placements would have indicated you were at the correct rank for you at that point in time.
You wouldn't know your MMR, no one does (except Riot). Any websites that tell you what your MMR is are just estimates and shouldn't be taken as fact.
If you deserve silver you'll end up in silver. Good luck with your climb.
wether its now or after for some reason *grins* all the feeding skrubs die irl
Was also probably the new season. You always get shuffled down at the start of the season.

Aww it sucks that you got placed bronze despite going so well in placements :/ You did verse mostly bronze/silver (rip mmr) though so that would explain the ranking... I just skimmed your op gg so I'm not sure, but if you lost the first 3 games then won the next 7 that would be why your mmr ended so low. Your first few placement games have the most impact on your mmr.  

The good thing is, you have the entire season to climb! Placements are only 10 games out of the perhaps hundreds of games you'll play this season so don't take that ranking too seriously :p Like you said before, you know you deserve silver, so get out there on the rift and prove it :D
